pageContext.claim: “General Flynn was a highly respected person, and it turned out to be a scam on him. The FBI said he didn't lie. And Mueller's people wanted him to go to jail. Okay?”
pageContext.analysis: The FBI has not said this. In fact, Flynn pleaded guilty before two different judges to lying to the FBI in 2017, though he and the Justice Department are now seeking to throw out the case. Special counsel Robert Mueller recommended no jail time for Flynn based on his extensive cooperation.
